column2: Life in the shadows is a risky affair - eavesdroppers can be discovered, plots can backfire, and vengeful victims come after you dagger in hand! I am not proud of what I do, but it is for the greater good.
Even the mightiest army can be defeated by a single [Root.GetManWoman]. Cut off the head and the body falls. I am [Root.GetFirstName] - [Root.GetMasterMistress] of Shadows.
I - and my trusted snoops and sneaks - will keep a very close eye on the activities of [From.GetTitledName]... a close eye indeed.
There is no point spying on [target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName] anymore, considering [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] is dead!
[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName] has ended up in prison, so there's no point spying on [target_spy_on.GetObjectPronoun] anymore.
[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName], the target of my current spy efforts, has tragically fallen comatose, making the endeavour pointless.
[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer present in the realm, so there is no further point to my spying.
I am not having much luck spying on [target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps I should focus my efforts elsewhere?
My spying on [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] has revealed [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] complicity in a shadowy plot to [uncovered_plotter.GetPlot]!
My snoops overheard [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] as [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] told shocking lies about [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] rightful liege! How should I use this information?

I have unearthed authentic love letters proving that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is actually a bastard! [target_spy_on.GetPossPronounCap] mother, [target_spy_on.Mother.GetTitledFirstName] had a torrid love affair with [target_spy_on.RealFather.GetTitledName]. How should I use this shocking information?
My eyes and ears have discovered the bizarre and repulsive truth about [target_spy_on.GetTitledName]'s sexual preferences. How should I use this juicy information?
Thanks to my loyal spies, I have found out that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is attempting to promote [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] vile heresies. How should I use this information?
My trusted informants tell me that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is preaching [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] false religion in [target_spy_on.Capital.GetName]. How should I use this information?

Though of somewhat dubious provenance, I have received information that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is plotting treason against [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] rightful liege! How should I use this explosive information?
[From.GetTitledName] claims to have proof that I have slandered [From.GetObjectPronoun] - just cause for arrest and imprisonment!

[From.GetTitledName] claims to have discovered proof that my real father is in fact [Root.RealFather.GetTitledName], making me a bastard! I could be arrested, or even have my titles revoked over this!
[From.GetTitledName] claims to have unearthed shocking evidence of my criminal deviancy and low morals. I could be arrested over this slander.
[From.GetTitledName] is claiming that I am promoting heresy! I could be arrested over this.
[From.GetTitledName] is claiming that I am attempting to spread my [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith! I could be arrested over this.
[From.GetTitledName] is publicly denouncing me as a traitor, claiming to have witnesses that can testify against me. I could be arrested, or even have my titles revoked over this!
[From.GetTitledName] has provided me with proof that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] has been viciously slandering me! How should I use this information?

[From.GetTitledName] has unearthed authentic love letters proving that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is actually a bastard! [target_spy_on.GetPossPronounCap] mother, [target_spy_on.Mother.GetTitledFirstName] had a torrid love affair with [target_spy_on.RealFather.GetTitledName]. How should I use this shocking information?
[From.GetTitledName] has given me bizarre and repulsive evidence concerning [target_spy_on.GetTitledName]'s sexual preferences. How should I use this juicy information?
[From.GetTitledName] claims that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is attempting to promote vile heresies. How should I use this information?
[From.GetTitledName] tell me that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is preaching [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] false religion in [target_spy_on.Capital.Capital.GetName]. How should I respond to this?
Though of somewhat dubious provenance, [From.GetTitledName] has presented me with evidence that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is plotting treason against me! How should I respond to this?
[From.GetTitledName] was grateful, and upset, about the evidence I provided against [target_spy_on.GetTitledName]. [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] has been publicly denounced and humiliated!
[From.GetTitledName] was grateful, and upset, about the evidence I provided against [target_spy_on.GetTitledName], and will use it to blackmail [target_spy_on.GetObjectPronoun] out of factionalism.
[From.GetTitledName] reacted with shock at the evidence I provided against [target_spy_on.GetTitledName], but will not take any action against [target_spy_on.GetObjectPronoun].

[From.GetTitledName] claims to have proof that I have slandered [From.GetObjectPronoun]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...

[From.GetTitledName] claims to have discovered proof that my real father is in fact [Root.RealFather.GetTitledName], making me a bastard! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...

[From.GetTitledName] claims to have unearthed shocking evidence of my criminal deviancy and low morals. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...
[From.GetTitledName] is claiming to know that I am promoting heresy, but promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...

[From.GetTitledName] is claiming to know about my attempts to spread my [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...

[From.GetTitledName] is claiming to have witnesses that can testify to the fact that I'm a traitor! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...
When confronted with the evidence, [From.GetTitledFirstName] swore to stay out of all factions and be loyal.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] just laughed at the evidence, flat out refusing to stop meddling in political factionalism.
When confronted with the evidence, [From.GetTitledFirstName] swore to join my factions.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] just laughed at the evidence, flat out refusing to join my factions.
I have found out nothing new and useful about [target_spy_on.GetTitledName], but, as my shady informant pointed out, there is nothing preventing me from making stuff up. The bigger the lie...
Several vicious rumors have been circulating about me lately. With a lot of effort, I have finally managed to trace them back to [From.GetTitledName]!

One of my informants, a young soldier with more vices than he can afford, has managed to gain the trust of [target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and now often stands guard outside [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] door. I don't understand how the fellow managed it, but who am I to look a gift horse in the mouth? For enough gold, he might be persuaded to get rid of [target_spy_on.GetFirstName]... violently.

I try to sit up in bed, but someone is holding me down! It's the burly armsman with the trustworthy face I promoted to the guard last week. Another assailant is trying to force a rag into my mouth. Holding my nose too... can't breathe...

I try to sit up in bed, but someone is holding me down! It's the burly armsman with the trustworthy face I promoted to the guard last week. There is a skinny little fellow with him, grinning viciously as he produces a dagger. Screaming and thrashing about, I manage to kick the guard in the groin and break free. I punch the other one in the nose and rush from the room!

I try to sit up in bed, but someone is holding me down! It's the burly armsman with the trustworthy face I promoted to the guard last week. There is a skinny little fellow with him, grinning viciously as he produces a dagger and stabs me! Screaming and thrashing about, I manage to kick the guard in the groin and break free. I punch the other one in the nose and rush from the room, trailing blood.

In disguise, I meet up with my friend, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s burly armsman and his shifty-looking associate at a run-down tavern. Grinning, he recounts how they stabbed [From.GetTitledName] to death in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed. I hand them a bag of coins and leave.

My spy, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s burly armsman, managed to slay the [GetRootFromInsult] in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed. Unfortunately, he was captured trying to escape. My complicity is known!

In disguise, I meet up with my friend, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s burly armsman and his shifty-looking associate at a run-down tavern. Shamefacedly, he recounts how they stabbed [From.GetTitledFirstName] in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed, and how [From.GetSubjectPronoun] somehow managed to get away. I pat him on the shoulder and tell him it's alright.
My spy, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s burly armsman, only managed to wound the [GetRootFromInsult]. Worse, he was captured trying to escape. My complicity is known!

In disguise, I meet up with my friend, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s burly armsman and his shifty-looking associate at a run-down tavern. Shamefacedly, he recounts how they attacked [From.GetTitledFirstName] in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed, but how [From.GetSubjectPronoun] managed to break free and get away. I pat him on the shoulder and tell him it's alright.
My spy, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s burly armsman, completely botched the attack on the [GetRootFromInsult]. Worse, he was captured trying to escape. My complicity is known!

I have learned from my little birds that [target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] plans to travel the realm incognito for a lark, mingling with the common folk. [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] will only be protected by two loyal friends during this little adventure - a great opportunity to have [target_spy_on.GetObjectPronoun] abducted, if I so wished.

On a lark, I decided to travel among the common folk incognito with but a friend, a servant and a bodyguard. As we ride through a forest, an arrow suddenly sprouts from the neck of my trusty guard! Shouting a warning, I ride like crazy to get away...
My hired thugs managed to waylay [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and brought [From.GetObjectPronoun] to me in a sack!
The thugs I hired failed to capture [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], though apparently they slew a guard and a servant in the attempt.
I have decided to free [From.GetTitledName] from the dungeons of [From.Host.GetTitledName]. It will take time - and likely some gold - but [From.GetFirstName] deserves a better fate!

I have decided to liberate my beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] from the filthy paws of her abductor, [From.Employer.GetTitledName]. It will take time - and likely some gold - but [From.GetFirstName] deserves a better fate!
[target_captive.GetTitledFirstName] has tragically died in captivity before I had a chance to break [target_captive.GetObjectPronoun] out.
[target_captive.GetTitledFirstName] has tragically fallen comatose, making my endeavour to free [target_captive.GetObjectPronoun] rather pointless.
[target_captive.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer a prisoner, so I can abort my plans to free [target_captive.GetObjectPronoun].

I've approached [target_agent.GetBestName] at the court of [target_agent.Employer.GetTitledName] with my plan to liberate [target_captive.GetTitledFirstName]. [target_agent.GetFirstName] is sympathetic and might be persuaded to take the risk...

I woke from my troubled sleep with a start. Was that a thud outside my cell? Keys rattle in the lock and the door opens to a thin beam of light. It's [target_agent.GetBestName]! 'Come with me quickly [Root.GetLordLady]! [target_agent.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has hired me to help you escape!'

I received some bad news this morning. My prisoner, [target_captive.GetBestName] escaped from [target_captive.GetPossPronoun] cell in the night. [target_captive.GetSubjectPronounCap] had outside help - one of the guards might never wake from the blow to his head...

My concubine [target_captive.GetBestName] has fled! She climbed out of her tower room window, probably with outside assistance, because my guards were completely unable to locate her before she escaped my realm.

My consort [target_captive.GetBestName] has fled! He climbed out of his tower room window, probably with outside assistance, because my guards were completely unable to locate him before he escaped my realm.
Good news! [target_captive.GetBestName] was successfully sprung from captivity by the daring [target_agent.GetBestName] and is safely back in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!

I woke from my troubled sleep with a start. Was that a thud outside my cell? Keys rattle in the lock and the door opens to a bright light. It's that ogre of a gaoler. 'This blighter attempted your rescue', he growls, and holds up a comatose [target_agent.GetManWoman] like a ragdoll. '[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] won't be too pleased, now will [Root.Host.GetSubjectPronoun]!?'

The prison guards foiled an escape attempt last night. My treacherous [GetFromFromRelation] [target_agent.GetBestName] was captured trying to free [target_captive.GetTitledName] from [target_captive.GetPossPronoun] cell!

My [GetFromRelation] [target_captive.GetFirstName] was almost abducted last night. The treacherous [target_agent.GetBestName] attempted to 'rescue' her by climbing in through the window, but slipped and fell! When questioned, the concussed [target_agent.GetFirstName] admitted that [target_rescuer.GetTitledName] was behind this chivalrous idiocy.
The [GetRootFromInsult] [target_captive.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] had me thrown me in the oubliette to make sure I don't escape!
Bad news... [target_agent.GetBestName] failed to free [target_captive.GetBestName] from [target_captive.GetPossPronoun] captivity and was imprisoned [target_agent.GetReflexivePronoun]!
My agent in [target_captive.Host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s court, [target_agent.GetBestName], is no longer able to carry out the mission.

Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], I fear that the plan I have devised to liberate [target_captive.GetBestName] will cost more money than I had estimated. If you still wish see [target_captive.GetObjectPronoun] free, please send me the necessary funds.\n\nYour friend, [target_agent.GetBestName]
Despite my best efforts, I still have not managed to find anyone at the court of [target_captive.Host.GetTitledFirstName] who would be willing to help [target_captive.GetBestName] escape.

I watched from the shadows as my spymaster, [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], surreptitiously marked a spot on the wall with a piece of chalk. This might just be [Root.job_spymaster.GetPossPronoun] normal skulduggery, but my intuition says not...
Eavesdropping from a secret passage in the walls, I overheard my faithless spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] talking to another conspirator. They are plotting to [target_plotter.GetPlot]!
My snooping [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], apparently overheard me plotting murder and did not take kindly to my plans. I have been arrested!

Over the last week, I have observed my spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] carefully and found nothing further to arouse my suspicion. Perhaps I'll just have to accept that odd behaviour goes with the job...

I have noticed my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] clumsily spying on me lately. It probably has something to do with [From.GetPossPronoun] unhealthy obsession with intrigue and an overly suspicious mind. I should be careful.
I don't want to die like this!
[target_snooper.GetTitledName] sends [target_snooper.GetPossPronoun] regards!'
Under torture, the two men admitted that [target_snooper.GetTitledName] hired them!
Unfortunately, the two assailants got away.
...and manage to outdistance the bandits! Amateurs.
...but we are surrounded! No bandits, but the agents of [target_snooper.GetTitledName].
I shall rule from the shadows.
I wonder what secrets [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] is hiding?
Time to turn my attention elsewhere.
Yes, this is pointless.
Knowledge is power!
Inform [target_spy_on.GetPossPronoun] liege, [target_spy_on.Liege.GetTitledName].
The liege of §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§! will decide how to deal with [target_spy_on.GetHerHim].\n
Foul lies!
Muahaha!
The things I do for stability in the realm...
A wasted opportunity!
I have no choice but to agree.
[From.GetSubjectPronounCap] will live to regret this!
I have it! [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] likes to dress up as a [target_spy_on.GetManWomanOpp]!
How about a classic? [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] takes little boys to bed!
Midgets, shoes... No! [target_spy_on.GetFirstName] is having an affair with a feisty goat!
[target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] likes to bathe in the blood of virgins. Brilliant!
[target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] murdered a childhood friend at the tender age of 11!
[target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] has an imaginary friend called Bappo!
[target_spy_on.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]! Yes, [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] is surely a willing slave to dark forces!
[target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronounCap] leads a secret life as a prostitute in a brothel in [target_spy_on.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
The [GetRootFromInsult]!
Yes, that would be expedient.
Outside, I order my guards to tie up the loose ends...
It was worth it!
I hope [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] dies from infection!
Incompetent bungler! I should have done it myself.
Ah yes. It would suit my purposes marvellously!
Morons! You can't find good help these days...
I'll probably need an agent in [target_captive.Host.Capital.Capital.GetName]...
Well, it was worth a shot!
Put the plan in motion!
Freedom!
[target_rescuer.GetTitledName] was surely behind this!
Poor [target_agent.GetManWoman]... was that [target_agent.GetBestName]?
The dungeon is not secure enough. Throw [target_captive.GetFirstName] in the oubliette!
I will die here...
Damnation! Security will be too tight now.
I will have to look for another contact...
I guess I have no choice...
Keep looking
Time to spy on the spy
Arrest [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] immediately!
I have more important things to do
Lead [From.GetObjectPronoun] a merry chase!
I shall strike terror into the hearts of my foes!
No, I am sure [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] is up to something...
Aha! Now I can call off my spies.
Plot is revealed and I will stop spying on §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledName]§!
Expose and denounce [target_spy_on.GetObjectPronoun] publicly, giving me a reason to arrest [target_spy_on.GetObjectPronoun]!
Denounce [target_spy_on.GetObjectPronoun], giving me reasons for arrest and revokation!
Publicly denounce §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n
Never!
No, I need something real.
Murder is going too far!
No, I have no reason to do that.
Bribe [target_agent.GetFirstName] and go ahead with the plan.
Tighten security!
I give up!
No, I can trust [intrigue_spymaster.GetObjectPronoun]
Hold off. I will deal with this later.
I can't take any chances. Have [Root.job_spymaster.GetObjectPronoun] replaced.
And yet, I won't let the shadows define me...
Threaten [target_spy_on.GetFirstName] with exposure unless [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] stays out of all factions.
§Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§! will either stay out of factions or be exposed, giving you the right to imprison [target_spy_on.GetHerHim].\n
No... I think it is time to spy on someone else.
Seduce [target_agent.GetFirstName] and go ahead with the plan.
Time to abandon this plan
Threaten [target_spy_on.GetFirstName] with exposure unless [target_spy_on.GetSubjectPronoun] joins my factions.
§Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§! will either join your factions or be exposed, giving you the right to imprison [target_spy_on.GetHerHim].\n
I've changed my mind. Abort the whole scheme.
Keep this information to myself.
Do not use the information, but keep spying on §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
Do not use the information against §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
I see, but I think it is time to spy on someone else.
Do not use the information and stop spying on §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! finds out that I started the rumors.
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§! is attacked and hopefully slain...
Some thugs are hired, with orders to bring me §Y[This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§! alive.
